title: mulch init should be idempotent â€” re-run initMulchDir even when .mulch/ exists
description: Currently `mulch init` bails early with '.mulch/ already exists' if the directory is present. This means newly added init-time artifacts (like .gitattributes merge=union line or .mulch/README.md) don't get created for existing projects. The init command should re-run initMulchDir() to fill in missing pieces idempotently, since initMulchDir() already handles all the skip-if-present logic internally.
